summary: A home styled like a bandit hideout, for outlaw who is looking for a base of operations.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/QtD7v94.png[/img][/url][/center]


This mod is a request I fulfilled some time ago for a bandit lair home. This requires no DLC and is fully navmeshed. I had kind of forgotten about it, but I found it today and I think it's good enough to be released. It was a lot of work, after all!

Located near Lake Ilinalta, Banehallow Camp is a roomy player home for the outlaw who is looking for a base of operations. It has all crafting stations including a smelter, a nice cooking area, sleeping, reading and torture rooms (that last one was part of the request and I'm not very good at making evil stuff, so hope that doesn't disappoint), as well as a vault protected by a double door where you can store your loot. The master bedroom has a shelf to display your most prized treasure, and a grate that leads to an escape door in case of danger.

It includes a visible map marker for you to travel to your new home, and a group of bandits who are essential and will be happy to follow you on your raids.

izon87604 has also made a wonderful video review for your enjoyment - thank you!
[youtube]-027ToKYTcA[/youtube]

To install, extract the contents of your downloaded file to your 'SteamSteamAppsCommonSkyrimData' folder. Then activate the mod through your preferred launcher by ticking the checkbox next to the esp. Have fun!

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
author: Jokerine
